subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Those who know Stewart say he is getting back to his old, playful self after a struggle to recover from a broken leg and a crash in which he struck and killed a young driver at a dirt-track race.
snippet: Those who know Stewart say he is getting back to his old, playful self after a struggle to recover from a broken leg and a crash in which he struck and killed a young driver at a dirt-track race.
